rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows on the south side to ensure maximum daylighting as per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room, with east facing windows for positive energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
North-facing master bedroom ensuring privacy and optimal natural light in accordance with Vastu norms.
South-west oriented children's room designed for a calm environment and adequate ventilation.
Dedicated home office space positioned in the northeast corner to harness productivity and positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with west-facing windows ensuring proper ventilation and alignment with traditional design norms.
Well-planned bathroom for optimal hygiene, located near the master bedroom.

openings.description: Main entrance is positioned on the south side for a welcoming and auspicious entry.
Service entrance to facilitate movement of materials without disturbing the living spaces.

additional_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool integrated within the layout with a surrounding deck and garden area.
Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation and social gatherings.
